verses.verse: <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H8323>rule<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And a <S%H376>man<s%> shall be as an <S%H4224>hiding<s%> place from the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and a <S%H5643>covert<s%> from the <S%H2230>tempest;<s%> as <S%H6388>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H6724>dry<s%> place, as the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of a <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> in a <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
And the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of them that <S%H7200>see<s%> shall not be <S%H8159>dim,<s%> and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of them that <S%H8085>hear<s%> shall <S%H7181>listen.<s%>

The <S%H3824>heart<s%> also of the <S%H4116>rash<s%> shall <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H5926>stammerers<s%> shall be <S%H4116>ready<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6703>plainly.<s%>

The <S%H5036>vile<s%> person shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5081>liberal,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H3596>churl<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to be <S%H7771>bountiful.<s%>

For the <S%H5036>vile<s%> person will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5039>villainy,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> to <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H2612>hypocrisy,<s%> and to <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H8442>error<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make <S%H7324>empty<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> and he will cause the <S%H4945>drink<s%> of the <S%H6771>thirsty<s%> to <S%H2637>fail.<s%>

The <S%H3627>instruments<s%> also of the <S%H3596>churl<s%> are <S%H7451>evil:<s%> he <S%H3289>devises<s%> <S%H2154>wicked<s%> <S%H2154>devices<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H6035>poor<s%> <S%H6041><s%> with <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H561>words,<s%> even when the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4941>right.<s%>
But the <S%H5081>liberal<s%> <S%H3289>devises<s%> <S%H5081>liberal<s%> things; and by <S%H5081>liberal<s%> things shall he <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

<S%H6965>Rise<s%> up, you <S%H802>women<s%> that are at <S%H7600>ease;<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> you <S%H982>careless<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H565>speech.<s%>

Many <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H8141>years<s%> shall you be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> you <S%H982>careless<s%> women: for the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail,<s%> the <S%H625>gathering<s%> shall not <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H2729>Tremble,<s%> you women that are at <S%H7600>ease;<s%> be <S%H7264>troubled,<s%> you <S%H982>careless<s%> ones: <S%H6584>strip<s%> you, and make you <S%H6209>bore,<s%> and <S%H2290>gird<s%> sackcloth on your <S%H2504>loins.<s%>
They shall <S%H5594>lament<s%> for the <S%H7699>teats,<s%> for the <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> for the <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>

On the <S%H127>land<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H6975>thorns<s%> and <S%H8068>briers;<s%> <S%H3588>yes,<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H4885>joy<s%> in the <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H7151>city:<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> shall be <S%H5203>forsaken;<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H5800>left;<s%> the <S%H6076>forts<s%> and <S%H975>towers<s%> shall be for <S%H4631>dens<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>asses,<s%> a <S%H4829>pasture<s%> of <S%H5739>flocks;<s%>

<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> be <S%H6168>poured<s%> on us from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> be a <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field, and the <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field be <S%H2803>counted<s%> for a <S%H3293>forest.<s%>
Then <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field.

And the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall be <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and the <S%H5656>effect<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8252>quietness<s%> and <S%H983>assurance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in a <S%H7965>peaceable<s%> <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> and in <S%H4009>sure<s%> <S%H4908>dwellings,<s%> and in <S%H7600>quiet<s%> <S%H4496>resting<s%> places;
When it shall <S%H1258>hail,<s%> <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H3293>forest;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H8213>low<s%> in a <S%H8219>low<s%> place.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are you that <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that <S%H7971>send<s%> forth thither the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass.<s%>
